languages.text: В плену гемункула томится могучий космический десантник, Ангел Императора. Привлечь его на свою сторону было бы мудрым поступком.
One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.
languages.original_text: В плену гемункула томится могучий космический десантник, Ангел Императора. Привлечь его на свою сторону было бы мудрым поступком.

traits.locale_text: One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.
One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.
One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.

languages.text: L'un des anges de l'Empereur, un puissant Space Marine, est retenu prisonnier par l'hémoncule. Il serait avisé de le convaincre de rejoindre l'escouade.
languages.original_text: One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.

traits.locale_text: L'un des anges de l'Empereur, un puissant Space Marine, est retenu prisonnier par l'hémoncule. Il serait avisé de le convaincre de rejoindre l'escouade.

languages.text: 帝皇的天使，强大的星际战士沦为了血伶人的俘虏。如果能说服他加入队伍，这会是个明智的决定。
languages.original_text: One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.

traits.locale_text: 帝皇的天使，强大的星际战士沦为了血伶人的俘虏。如果能说服他加入队伍，这会是个明智的决定。

languages.text: 皇帝の天使のひとりである屈強なスペースマリーンがハモンキュラスに囚われている。彼を部隊へ加わるよう説得するのは賢明な判断だろう。
languages.original_text: One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝の天使のひとりである屈強なスペースマリーンがハモンキュラスに囚われている。彼を部隊へ加わるよう説得するのは賢明な判断だろう。

languages.text: Einer der Engel des Imperators, ein mächtiger Space Marine, wird von dem Haemonculus gefangen gehalten. Es wäre ratsam, ihn zu überzeugen, sich dem Trupp anzuschließen.
languages.original_text: One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.

traits.locale_text: Einer der Engel des Imperators, ein mächtiger Space Marine, wird von dem Haemonculus gefangen gehalten. Es wäre ratsam, ihn zu überzeugen, sich dem Trupp anzuschließen.

languages.text: Uno de los ángeles del Emperador, un poderoso Marine Espacial, es prisionero del Hemónculo. Convencerle de que se una a ti sería una decisión extremadamente acertada.
languages.original_text: One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los ángeles del Emperador, un poderoso Marine Espacial, es prisionero del Hemónculo. Convencerle de que se una a ti sería una decisión extremadamente acertada.

languages.text: İmparator'un Melekleri'nden biri olan kudretli bir Uzay Piyadesi, Haimonkulus'un esiri olmuş. Onu ekibe katılmaya ikna etmek, mantıklı bir hareket olacaktır.
languages.original_text: One of the Emperor's Angels, a mighty Space Marine, is being held captive by the Haemonculus. Convincing him to join the squad would be a wise decision.
